channel.description: Well the title says it all. I've got the NPC's all set up, not I want a shop thing to show up when I click 'trade' on the NPC.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2007, 09:14:25 AM[/size][hr]anyone? ALSO HOW COME MY CHARACTER IS INVINCIBLE!?
